Name: Black Cat
Desc: An agile and wise soul, endowed since birth with a well-maintained elegance and pride.\nThese mysterious passers-by are clad from head to toe in black fur, and purr from the shadows that hide their forms, only to reveal two large, gleaming golden eyes amidst the gloom. To some scholars, black cats symbolize the study of mysteries, magic, and portents from afar, and are very popular as a result.
